resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102999</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102999</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204420</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Periodic Table database</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periodische Tabelle Datenbank</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Base de données périodique de Tableau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Base de dados periódica da tabela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Base di dati periodica della Tabella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιοδική επιτραπέζια βάση δεδομένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Base de datos periódica del vector</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These lessons are designed to help students use their computer skills to create their own database using teacher directions, and they also learn how to read the Periodic Table and understand what it means.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektionen sind konzipiert, um 
Kursteilnehmern zu helfen, ihre Computerfähigkeiten zu verwenden, um 
ihre eigene Datenbank mit Lehrerrichtungen zu erstellen, und sie 
erlernen auch, wie man die periodische Tabelle liest und versteht, was
es bedeutet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces leçons sont conçues pour aider des 
étudiants à employer leurs qualifications d'ordinateur pour créer 
leur propre base de données en utilisant des directions de 
professeur, et elles apprennent également comment lire le Tableau 
périodique et comprendre ce que signifie il.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas lições são projetadas ajudar a estudantes
usar suas habilidades do computador criar sua própria base de dados 
usando sentidos do professor, e aprendem também como ler a tabela 
periódica e compreender o que significa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste lezioni sono destinate per aiutare gli 
allievi ad usare le loro abilità del calcolatore per creare la loro 
propria base di dati usando le direttive dell'insegnante ed egualmente
imparano come leggere la Tabella periodica e capire che cosa 
significa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα μαθήματα έχουν ως σκοπό να βοηθήσουν τους 
σπουδαστές να χρησιμοποιήσουν τις δεξιότητες υπολογιστών τους για 
να δημιουργήσουν τη βάση δεδομένων τους χρησιμοποιώντας τις 
κατευθύνσεις δασκάλων, και μαθαίνουν επίσης πώς να διαβάσουν τον
περιοδικό πίνακα και να καταλάβουν τι σημαίνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas lecciones se diseñan para ayudar a 
estudiantes a utilizar sus habilidades del ordenador para crear su 
propia base de datos usando direcciones del profesor, y también 
aprenden cómo leer el vector periódico y entender lo que significa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:FLORENCE B. WINSLOW
FN:FLORENCE B. WINSLOW
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204420</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102999</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/periodic-table-database</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
